Articles.Content:
So after deciding i wanted a pod racer this is the result of my efforts

Now this is podracing.

Description:

Capable of over 200m/s in the lower atmosphere and 10+g turns, this baby has some tricks up its sleeve that make it awesome fun to hoon around the space center in.

SAS is required at all times, and remember it takes a high midi-chlorian count to properly control a pod racer

Good luck and have fun.

(Not made with FAR or NEAR in mind)

Action group 1 toggles air intake.

Action group 2 toggles engines.

Download link: Part count: 165

http://www./download/ad7smzg09e3mauk/Now+this+is+podracing.craft

Edited February 22, 2015 by Roflcopterkklol

I want to give you some rep so bad, but I've given too much out lately...

Still, this is awesome. First full-stock podracer I've ever seen. (The others use KAS and other things)

First full-stock podracer I've ever seen. (The others use KAS and other things)

Really?

surely someone else has managed to get one working with stock ksp

Third appropriate place I've used Princess Bride memes today.

But seriously dude, this is amazing. Take all the rep.

Really?

surely someone else has managed to get one working with stock ksp

Perhaps, but I haven't seen them.

Seen several pod racers, even made one myself(badly). But, they either use modded parts, or do not look/fly like a pod racer. Yours does both. Making yours better.

Nicely done!
Hmm, stiff pods are easier to fly than those built with KAS, so I'm not sure if your title fits. I like the design, but without KAS it's just not the same.

Hmm, stiff pods are easier to fly than those built with KAS, so I'm not sure if your title fits. I like the design, but without KAS it's just not the same.

And if KAS were part of stock KSP i would use it but it is not so i don't.

I could do a modded version that is closer to being like one off the show using KAS and hover gear if enough people want me to

So after deciding i wanted a pod racer this is the result of my efforts

Now this is podracing.

http://i.imgur.com/buSCXMw.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/P3kzLBK.jpg

Description:

Capable of over 200m/s in the lower atmosphere and 10+g turns, this baby has some tricks up its sleeve that make it awesome fun to hoon around the space center in.

SAS is required at all times, and remember it takes a high midi-chlorian count to properly control a pod racer

Good luck and have fun.

(Not made with FAR or NEAR in mind)

Action group 1 toggles air intake.

Action group 2 toggles engines.

Download link: Part count: 165

http://www./download/ad7smzg09e3mauk/Now+this+is+podracing.craft

This is gorgeous looking and fun to fly

Well done!!

I'd love to see a KSP reconstruction of the episode 1 race in the desert with different styles of podracers (maybe through a challenge?) in multiplayer lol
I love how it just ignores gravity and goes where you point it. The joy of high TWR

First full-stock podracer I've ever seen. (The others use KAS and other things)
Really?

surely someone else has managed to get one working with stock ksp

Perhaps, but I haven't seen them.
Seen several pod racers, even made one myself(badly). But, they either use modded parts, or do not look/fly like a pod racer. Yours does both. Making yours better.

I made a pod racer, once. As a matter of fact, I made it way back in 0.24. I wouldn't say that it looks better than Roflcopter's, but it's a bit truer to the original Star Wars model. It's also Little-Anakin-Kerman sized (a bit smaller than any of the other pod-racers I've seen).

I do wish that pod racers were done more often. I've seen several, including a decent stock one or two. But pod racers have such a cool shape, and it's not difficult to make them work, as long as you hide some control surfaces... I have a feeling that 1.0 will kill most pod racer designs.

This is the last hurrah of pod racers, people! Make these things while you still have a chance.

-Upsilon

-Upsilon

Actually I think HarvesteR himself said that aerodynamic occlusion would occur only with cargo bays, to save computing resources.

So it should still work

Neato man, that thing should still work, my lawbreaker was made in 0.24 and still works so i dont see why it shouldnt
